data.title: Providing big data fundamentals for the Royal Air Force
data.meta_description: As a data savvy organisation, the Air Force wanted to advance their big data capabilities. They turned to Xomnia's Academy training.
data.text:
The Big Data Fundamentals of Xomnia provided us a shared understanding of the Big Data terms and concepts. It helped our discussion and was a good basis to explore our options.

L.J. (Jeroen) Snel Majoor

The Royal Netherlands Air Force is the military aviation branch of the Netherlands Armed Forces. As a data savvy organization, the Air Force wanted to set a firm base for discussion and understanding the options. Xomnia provided the Royal Air Force with the Big Data Fundamentals training. For more information about Xomniaâ€™s trainings, please visit Xomnia's Academy.
